problem.markdown:
>>How many parts are produced in the 1st hour? Assume the buffer is empty at time 0.<<
= 59
[explanation] Machine 1 and 2 can both produce 60 parts/hour. However, machine 2 must wait 1 minute before there is a part two work on. [explanation]
>>How many parts are produced in the second hour?<<
=60
[explanation] Now since the buffer machine 2 is continuously fed by machine 1, production rate reaches 60. However, the buffer is still empty. [explanation]
<script src="/static/st.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
problem.label: How many parts are produced in the 1st hour? Assume the buffer is empty at time 0.

div.p: Machine 1 and 2 can both produce 60 parts/hour. However, machine 2 must wait 1 minute before there is a part two work on.

problem.label: How many parts are produced in the second hour?

div.p: Now since the buffer machine 2 is continuously fed by machine 1, production rate reaches 60. However, the buffer is still empty.
